analyzed: bstan pa 'di zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor nges pa'i don bstan pa'i le'u 'di nyi tshe dang sbyar ro //
translated: This teaching is applied to just this chapter that teaches the yoga of the definitive meaning.

original: rnal 'byor nges pa'i don bstan pa zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims dang rig pa'i rnal 'byor gyis yongs su bsdus pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyi don nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rnal 'byor nges pa'i don bstan pa zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims dang rig pa'i rnal 'byor gyis yongs su bsdus pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyi don nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning of teaching the yoga of the definitive meaning is that it is the definitive teaching on the meaning of the essence of the path that is included in the yoga of ethics and the yoga of wisdom, which is to say, calm abiding and insight.

original: 'bras bu thob pa'i che ba nyid ni /
analyzed: 'bras bu thob pa'i che ba nyid ni /
translated: The greatness of attaining the result is taught

original: rnal 'byor nges pa'i don bstan pa 'di bshad pa na zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor nges pa'i don bstan pa 'di bshad pa na zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan te /
translated: by When this teaching of the yoga of the definitive meaning is explained... and so forth.

original: 'bras bu thob pa'i che ba nyid ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la chos bstan pa'i 'bras bu'i phan yon che ba rnam pa lnga bstan pa gang yin pa ste lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'bras bu thob pa'i che ba nyid ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la chos bstan pa'i 'bras bu'i phan yon che ba rnam pa lnga bstan pa gang yin pa ste lnga gang zhe na /
translated: The greatness of attaining the result is the greatness of the benefit that is the result of teaching the Dharma to sentient beings, the buddhas, and the bodhisattvas. It is the teaching of five aspects. What are the five?

original: de dag las sems can kha cig ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / de dag las sems can kha cig ni dam pa'i chos bstan pa de nyid kyi tshe chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul @222a * //
analyzed: de dag las sems can kha cig ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / de dag las sems can kha cig ni dam pa'i chos bstan pa de nyid kyi tshe chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul @222a * //
translated: Some of those beings will give rise to the mind set on unsurpassed and perfect awakening.üîΩSome of those beings will, at the very moment of being taught the sacred Dharma, give rise to the eye of Dharma with regard to phenomena, free from dust and uncontaminated.üîΩSome of those beings will, at the very moment of being taught the sacred Dharma, exhaust their defilements.

original: med cing dri ma dang bral ba bskyed bar 'gyur ba dang / de dag las sems can kha cig ni dam pa'i chos bstan pa'i mod la zag pa zad par 'gyur ba dang / de dag las sems can kha cig ni dam pa'i chos thos pa de nyid kyi mod la byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa mchog thob par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: med cing dri ma dang bral ba bskyed bar 'gyur ba dang / de dag las sems can kha cig ni dam pa'i chos bstan pa'i mod la zag pa zad par 'gyur ba dang / de dag las sems can kha cig ni dam pa'i chos thos pa de nyid kyi mod la byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa mchog thob par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: Some of those beings will, at the very moment of hearing the sacred Dharma, attain the supreme acceptance of the bodhisattvas.

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dam pa'i chos bstan pas lung 'bogs pa dang / kha thon byed pa dang / yang dag par sgrub pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i tshul gyis dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par byed pa ste /üîΩlnga po dag las dang po bzhi ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dam pa'i chos bstan pas lung 'bogs pa dang / kha thon byed pa dang / yang dag par sgrub pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i tshul gyis dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par byed pa ste / lnga po dag las dang po bzhi ni /
translated: The holy Dharma is made to endure for a long time by the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas teaching the holy Dharma, by the transmission of the scriptures, by recitation, and by the correct practice of the holy Dharma, which is passed from one to another.üîΩFrom among these five, the first four are to be applied in order to the four meanings beginning with the statement:

original: srog chags drug 'bum ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don bzhi dang go rims bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: srog chags drug 'bum ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don bzhi dang go rims bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: Six hundred thousand living beings generated the mind of unexcelled perfect enlightenment.

original: lnga pa ni mdo sde thams cad kyi mjug nas /
analyzed: lnga pa ni mdo sde thams cad kyi mjug nas /
translated: The fifth is to be applied to the passage at the end of all the sutras:

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
translated: The Bhagavan, having spoken this,

original: lha la sogs pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste mngon par dga'o zhes 'byung ba'i skabs dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: lha la sogs pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste mngon par dga'o zhes 'byung ba'i skabs dang sbyar ro //
translated: the world with its gods rejoiced in what the Bhagavan had said.

original: skabs 'dir dmigs kyis ma smos kyang mjug nas 'byung ba nyid skabs 'dir sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: skabs 'dir dmigs kyis ma smos kyang mjug nas 'byung ba nyid skabs 'dir sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Although not mentioned here, the conclusion should be applied here.

original: de dag gi tshig gi don ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de dag gi tshig gi don ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
translated: The meaning of the words is as explained above.

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i yid la byed pa thob par gyur to zhes bya ba ni snang ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur pa ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i yid la byed pa thob par gyur to zhes bya ba ni snang ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur pa ste /

original: de nyid kyis bzod pa mchog thob pa bstan to //
analyzed: de nyid kyis bzod pa mchog thob pa bstan to //

original: le'u brgyad pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad zin to /
analyzed: le'u brgyad pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad zin to /
translated: The meaning of the words of the eighth chapter and so on has been explained.

original: // / de ltar chos gdags pa rnam par gzhag pa las brtsams nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar chos gdags pa rnam par gzhag pa las brtsams nas /
translated: Thus, having begun with the presentation of the designation of phenomena,

original: rnal 'byor gyis yongs su bsdus pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam gyi rab tu dbye bas kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su shes par bya ba bstan nas /
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyis yongs su bsdus pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam gyi rab tu dbye bas kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su shes par bya ba bstan nas /
translated: the path of serenity and insight that is included in yoga, the classification of the path, and the knowledge of the characteristics of conventional truth have been explained.

original: de'i 'og tu theg pa rnam par gzhag pa las brtsams nas /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu theg pa rnam par gzhag pa las brtsams nas /
translated: After that, having begun with the presentation of the vehicles,

original: theg pa'i rnam par dbye ba ji lta ba bzhin du bstan nas kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su shes par bya ba bstan pa'i tshig don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: theg pa'i rnam par dbye ba ji lta ba bzhin du bstan nas kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su shes par bya ba bstan pa'i tshig don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: Having taught the divisions of the vehicles just as they are, he will teach the understanding of the characteristics of conventional truth.

original: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
analyzed: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
translated: Therefore, in order to teach that,

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhu ba zhus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi @222b le'u dgu pa 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhu ba zhus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi @222b le'u dgu pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: the noble Avalokite≈õvara asked the Blessed One, and so on. This chapter 9 of the noble Avalokite≈õvara was spoken.

original: de la le'u dgu pa 'di'i bsdus pa'i don ni mdor bsdu na theg pa rnam par gzhag pa las brtsams nas theg pa'i rnam par dbye ba ji lta ba bzhin bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de la le'u dgu pa 'di'i bsdus pa'i don ni mdor bsdu na theg pa rnam par gzhag pa las brtsams nas theg pa'i rnam par dbye ba ji lta ba bzhin bstan pa yin no //
translated: The concise meaning of this chapter 9 is, in brief, the teaching of the divisions of the vehicles, beginning with the presentation of the vehicles.

original: de yang rnam par dbye ba na pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa la mkhas par bya ba las brtsams nas dris pa dang lan brjod pa ste /
analyzed: de yang rnam par dbye ba na pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa la mkhas par bya ba las brtsams nas dris pa dang lan brjod pa ste /
translated: When that is divided, it is the question and answer that begin with the expertise in completing the perfections.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams theg pa chen pos bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams theg pa chen pos bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the perfections are included in the Great Vehicle.

original: de la pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa la mkhas par bya ba brtsams nas shes par bya ba ni theg pa rnam par gzhag pa las brtsams nas zhes bya bas bstan te /
analyzed: de la pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa la mkhas par bya ba brtsams nas shes par bya ba ni theg pa rnam par gzhag pa las brtsams nas zhes bya bas bstan te /
translated: The topic to be understood after beginning the skill in perfecting the perfections is indicated by the words ‚Äúfrom the point of view of the establishment of the vehicles.‚Äù

original: theg pa rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: theg pa rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The establishment of the vehicles refers to the Great Vehicle, the path of the bodhisattva together with its result.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa'i lam ni sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams so //
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa'i lam ni sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams so //
translated: The path of the bodhisattva consists of the stages and the perfections.

original: 'bras bu ni sangs rgyas kyi sa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu ni sangs rgyas kyi sa'o //
translated: The result is the stage of the Buddha.

original: de dag ni lam 'dis 'gro ba'i phyir theg pa dang / 'bras bu bgrod par bya ba'i phyir theg pa zhes bya ba ste ;
analyzed: de dag ni lam 'dis 'gro ba'i phyir theg pa dang / 'bras bu bgrod par bya ba'i phyir theg pa zhes bya ba ste ;
translated: They are called vehicles because one proceeds by means of them, and vehicles because one proceeds to the result.

original: de ltar na theg pa chen po byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa rnam par gzhag pa las brtsams pa yin mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar na theg pa chen po byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa rnam par gzhag pa las brtsams pa yin mod kyi /
translated: Thus, the establishment of the Great Vehicle, the path of the bodhisattva together with its result, is begun.

original: de ltar theg pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' lam dang 'bras bu dang bcas pa rnam par gzhag pa de las pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang lam ni gang 'bras bu ni gang zhes de dag gi rnam par dbye ba ji lta ba bzhin bstan pa
analyzed: de ltar theg pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' lam dang 'bras bu dang bcas pa rnam par gzhag pa de las pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang lam ni gang 'bras bu ni gang zhes de dag gi rnam par dbye ba ji lta ba bzhin bstan pa
translated: In this context, what are the perfections, what is the path and what is the result?

original: na sa ni rtogs pa yin la /
analyzed: na sa ni rtogs pa yin la /
translated: The levels are realization,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni rtogs pa dang spyod pa de gnyis ka yin la /üîΩ'bras bu ni sangs rgyas kyi sa yin pas spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pas rtogs pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur la /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni rtogs pa dang spyod pa de gnyis ka yin la / 'bras bu ni sangs rgyas kyi sa yin pas spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pas rtogs pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur la /
translated: the practice of the perfections is both realization and practice,üîΩand the result is the level of buddhahood.üîΩThus, since the practice is perfected, realization is also perfected and since the path of practice and realization is perfected, the result, the level of buddhahood, is also perfected.

original: spyod pa dang rtogs pa'i lam de yongs su rdzogs pas 'bras bu sangs rgyas kyi sa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir spyod pa thog mar 'gro ba'i go rims kyi dbang du byas nas pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba mkhas par
analyzed: spyod pa dang rtogs pa'i lam de yongs su rdzogs pas 'bras bu sangs rgyas kyi sa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir spyod pa thog mar 'gro ba'i go rims kyi dbang du byas nas pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba mkhas par
translated: In terms of the sequence in which the practice comes first, the perfection is perfected,

original: bya ba las brtsams nas zhes bya ba smos par zad kyi /
analyzed: bya ba las brtsams nas zhes bya ba smos par zad kyi /
translated: It is only said beginning with activity,

original: dngos su theg pa chen po byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas ba rnam par gzhag pa las brtsams nas zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: dngos su theg pa chen po byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas ba rnam par gzhag pa las brtsams nas zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: but in fact it is to be applied to beginning with the presentation of the Mahayana path of the bodhisattva together with its result.

original: de ni le'u 'di la lus rnam par gzhag pa spyi dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de ni le'u 'di la lus rnam par gzhag pa spyi dang sbyar ro //
translated: That is the general body of this chapter.

original: dris pa dang ldan brjod pa zhes bya ba ni theg pa'i rnam par dbye ba ji lta ba bzhin bstan pa zhes bya bas @223a * //
analyzed: dris pa dang ldan brjod pa zhes bya ba ni theg pa'i rnam par dbye ba ji lta ba bzhin bstan pa zhes bya bas @223a * //
translated: The phrase having questions and statements is explained by the teaching of the divisions of the vehicles just as they are.

original: bstan te / pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa la mkhas pa'i rnam par dbye ba ji lta ba bzhin du bstan zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bstan te / pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa la mkhas pa'i rnam par dbye ba ji lta ba bzhin du bstan zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It means the teaching of the divisions of the expertise in the complete perfection of the perfections just as they are.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa la mkhas pa de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa la mkhas pa de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: That expertise in the complete perfection of the perfections is twofold:

original: ji ltar yongs su rdzogs pa dang // gang dag yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar yongs su rdzogs pa dang // gang dag yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
translated: how they are perfected and what perfections are perfected.

original: de la ji ltar yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i sgo nas spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par mngon pa'i phyir sa rab tu dbye bas pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa ste /

translated: How is it fully completed? It is fully completed by the perfection of realization, because the perfection of practice is evident. The perfection of the transcendences is taught by the analysis of the stages.

original: de'i phyir 'dir rtogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu dbye ba thog mar ston te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir rtogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu dbye ba thog mar ston te /
translated: Therefore, here the perfection of realization is first taught by way of analysis.

original: de ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa bcu gang lags pa de dag ni 'di lta ste zhes bya ba nas de'i phyir smon lam rgya chen pos 'gro ba dang / smon lam gyi stobs can rnams zhes gsungs pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
analyzed: de ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa bcu gang lags pa de dag ni 'di lta ste zhes bya ba nas de'i phyir smon lam rgya chen pos 'gro ba dang / smon lam gyi stobs can rnams zhes gsungs pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
translated: The perfection of realization is taught in the passage beginning, ‚ÄúBlessed One, the ten stages of the bodhisattvas are these‚Äù and ending, ‚ÄúTherefore, they are called those who go by the vast aspiration and those who have the power of aspiration.‚Äù

original: gang dag yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang bcu yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa ste /
analyzed: gang dag yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang bcu yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa ste /
translated: What is fully completed? The perfection of the six or ten transcendences, such as generosity, is taught as fully completed.

original: de'i phyir 'dir rtogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rab tu dbye ba bstan pa'i 'og tu spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba rab tu dbye ba ston pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir rtogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rab tu dbye ba bstan pa'i 'og tu spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba rab tu dbye ba ston pa ste /
translated: Therefore, after teaching the classification of the complete realization here, the classification of the perfections that complete the practice is taught.

original: de ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi du mchis lags zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: de ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi du mchis lags zhes bya ba nas /
translated: The Bhagavan said, ‚ÄúBodhisattvas have many bases of training.‚Äù

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to zhes bya ba la thug pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to zhes bya ba la thug pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
translated: Then the Bhagavan spoke these verses:

original: de la dang por sa rab tu dbye ba'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshang bar bya ste de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: de la dang por sa rab tu dbye ba'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshang bar bya ste de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The meaning of the words of the classification of the levels will now be explained. It is twofold:

original: bstan pa dang / bshad pa'o //
analyzed: bstan pa dang / bshad pa'o //
translated: the teaching and the explanation.

original: de la bstan pa ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bcu gang lags pa de dag ni 'di lta ste zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi sa ni bcu gcig lags na zhes gsungs pa'i bar gyis bstan te /üîΩdes ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa bcu dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa bstan to //
analyzed: de la bstan pa ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bcu gang lags pa de dag ni 'di lta ste zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi sa ni bcu gcig lags na zhes gsungs pa'i bar gyis bstan te / des ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa bcu dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa bstan to //
translated: The teaching is indicated by the passage beginning with ‚ÄúBhagavan, the ten of the bodhisattvas are these‚Äù and ending with ‚Äúthe buddha stage is the eleventh.‚ÄùüîΩThis indicates the ten stages of the bodhisattva and the stage of the tathagata.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa bcu ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa la gnas pa dang / lhag pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa dang / lhag pa'i sems la gnas pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i shes rab la @223b gnas pa dang /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa bcu ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa la gnas pa dang / lhag pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa dang / lhag pa'i sems la gnas pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i shes rab la @223b gnas pa dang /
translated: The ten stages of the bodhisattva are the stage of joy, the stage of superior morality, the stage of superior mind, the stage of superior wisdom endowed with the elements that lead to enlightenment, the stage of practicing with firm conviction, the stage of practicing with superior aspiration, the stage of practicing with superior wisdom, the stage of practicing with direct realization, the stage of practicing with skillful means, the stage of practicing with direct realization of the perfection of wisdom, and the stage of practicing with the fulfillment of the bodhisattvas activities.

original: den pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i shes rab la gnas pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i shes rab la gnas pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la gnas ba mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas shing rtsol ba dang bcas pa dang /
analyzed: den pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i shes rab la gnas pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i shes rab la gnas pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la gnas ba mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas shing rtsol ba dang bcas pa dang /
translated: It is to abide in superior wisdom endowed with truth, to abide in superior wisdom endowed with dependent origination,üîΩto abide in signlessness with effort and with manifest activity,

original: mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la lhun gyis grub pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa la gnas pa dang / gnas pa mchog go //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la lhun gyis grub pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa la gnas pa dang / gnas pa mchog go //
translated: to abide in signlessness without manifest activity and spontaneously, to abide in the correct discriminations, and to abide in the highest.

original: de la rab tu dga' ba la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba zhes bya bas bstan te /üîΩrigs la gnas pa dang mos pas spyod pa la gnas pa las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de la rab tu dga' ba la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba zhes bya bas bstan te / rigs la gnas pa dang mos pas spyod pa la gnas pa las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: The stage of joy is taught by the bodhisattva stage called the Joyful.

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the stage of a bodhisattva of pure superior intention who has gone beyond the stage of abiding in the lineage and the stage of conduct motivated by aspiration.

original: lhag pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa ni dri ma med pa zhes bya bas bstan te /
analyzed: lhag pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa ni dri ma med pa zhes bya bas bstan te /
translated: Abiding in superior morality is shown by stainless.

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa'i gzhis rang bzhin gyis tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i gnas gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa'i gzhis rang bzhin gyis tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i gnas gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the basis of the purity of superior intention, which is the basis of natural morality.

original: lhag pa'i sems la gnas pa ni 'od byed pa zhes bya bas bstan te /
analyzed: lhag pa'i sems la gnas pa ni 'od byed pa zhes bya bas bstan te /
translated: Abiding in superior mind is shown by illuminating.

original: lhag pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa rnam par dag pa'i gzhi dag gis 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dag la gnas pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: lhag pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa rnam par dag pa'i gzhi dag gis 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dag la gnas pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the basis of abiding in mundane meditative stabilization, liberation, concentration, and meditative absorption, which is the basis of pure superior morality.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i lhag pa'i shes rab la gnas pa ni 'od 'phro can zhes bya bas bstan te /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i lhag pa'i shes rab la gnas pa ni 'od 'phro can zhes bya bas bstan te /
translated: Abiding in superior wisdom that is the factor of enlightenment is shown by radiant.

original: 'jig rten pa'i shes pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la brten nas bden pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i shes pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la brten nas bden pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: It is the basis of the realization of the four noble truths in dependence on meditative stabilization that is the basis of the purity of mundane knowledge.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag ba la sogs pa byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang dag par rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i gnas pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag ba la sogs pa byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang dag par rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i gnas pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The station of the thorough differentiation of the thirty-seven aids to enlightenment such as the applications of mindfulness.

original: bden pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i shes rab la gnas pa ni shin tu sbyang dka' zhes bya bas bstan te /
analyzed: bden pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i shes rab la gnas pa ni shin tu sbyang dka' zhes bya bas bstan te /
translated: The station of superior insight endowed with the truths is taught by ‚Äúdifficult to purify.‚Äù

original: byang chub kyi phyogs rab tu rnam par 'byed pa la brten nas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i gnas gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs rab tu rnam par 'byed pa la brten nas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i gnas gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the station of the thorough understanding of the noble truths just as they are, based on the thorough differentiation of the aids to enlightenment.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i shes rab la gnas pa ni mngon du gyur ces bya bas bstan te /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i shes rab la gnas pa ni mngon du gyur ces bya bas bstan te /
translated: The station of superior insight endowed with dependent origination is taught by ‚Äúmanifest.‚Äù

original: bden pa rtogs pa de nyid kyi dbang du byas nas /üîΩde ma shes pas sdug bsngal 'byung ba rgyu dang bcas pa rab tu rnam par @224a * //
analyzed: bden pa rtogs pa de nyid kyi dbang du byas nas /üîΩde ma shes pas sdug bsngal 'byung ba rgyu dang bcas pa rab tu rnam par @224a * //
translated: Based on that very understanding of the truths,üîΩone thoroughly differentiates the twelve members of dependent origination in terms of their forward and reverse sequences.

original: 'byed pas rab tu phye ba dang / de shes pas sdug bsngal 'gog pa rgyu dang bcas pa rab tu rnam par 'byed pas rab tu phye ba'i gnas gang yin pa'o //üîΩmtshan ma med pa la gnas pa mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas shing rtsol ba dang bcas pa ni /üîΩring du song ba zhes bya bas bstan te /
analyzed: 'byed pas rab tu phye ba dang / de shes pas sdug bsngal 'gog pa rgyu dang bcas pa rab tu rnam par 'byed pas rab tu phye ba'i gnas gang yin pa'o // mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas shing rtsol ba dang bcas pa ni / ring du song ba zhes bya bas bstan te /

original: mtshan ma med pa la snga ma de nyid shas cher bsgoms pas rang gi ngang nyid kyis rgyun chags su bar chad med par 'jug pa'i lam dang ldan pa'i gnas gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa la snga ma de nyid shas cher bsgoms pas rang gi ngang nyid kyis rgyun chags su bar chad med par 'jug pa'i lam dang ldan pa'i gnas gang yin pa'o //
translated: The station of signlessness is that in which one is endowed with a path that enters into a continuous and uninterrupted state by means of one's own nature, through cultivating just that previous signlessness to a greater degree.

original: so so yang dag par rig par gnas pa ni /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig par gnas pa ni /
translated: The station of the correct individual awareness is

original: legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya bas bstan te /
analyzed: legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya bas bstan te /
translated: taught by the one called Excellent Wisdom.

original: shes rab dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu yongs su dag cing mi g-yo ba de nyid la brten nas blo gros chen po rgya cher rab tu thob ste /
analyzed: shes rab dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu yongs su dag cing mi g-yo ba de nyid la brten nas blo gros chen po rgya cher rab tu thob ste /
translated: Based on just that samƒÅdhi endowed with wisdom, which is very pure and unshakable, one attains the great and vast wisdom.

original: gzhan dag la chos yang dag par ston pa bla na med pa las brtsams nas /
analyzed: gzhan dag la chos yang dag par ston pa bla na med pa las brtsams nas /
translated: Having begun with the unsurpassed correct teaching of the Dharma to others,

original: chos rnams kyi rnam grangs dang mtshan nyid dang nges pa'i tshig dang rab tu dbye ba rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i gnas pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: chos rnams kyi rnam grangs dang mtshan nyid dang nges pa'i tshig dang rab tu dbye ba rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i gnas pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: it is the station of the correct discrimination of the enumeration, characteristics, definitions, and divisions of phenomena.

original: gnas pa'i mchog ni chos kyi sprin zhes bya bas bstan te /
analyzed: gnas pa'i mchog ni chos kyi sprin zhes bya bas bstan te /
translated: The supreme station is taught by the one called Cloud of Dharma.

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi mthar thug ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi mthar thug ste /
translated: The bodhisattva who, abiding in this, reaches the end of the bodhisattva path,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu chos kyi dbang bskur ba chen po thob bo //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu chos kyi dbang bskur ba chen po thob bo //
translated: and obtains the great anointment of Dharma in unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.

original: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa 'am /
analyzed: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa 'am /
translated: He is impeded by only one birth,

original: yang na srid pa tha ma par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: yang na srid pa tha ma par gyur pa ste /
translated: or else he is in his last existence.

original: gnas pa de'i mjug thogs su bar chad med pa kho nar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad par 'gyur ba'i gnas pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: gnas pa de'i mjug thogs su bar chad med pa kho nar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad par 'gyur ba'i gnas pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: Immediately after that abiding, he alone without interruption fully awakens to unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment and performs all the activities of a Buddha.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bya bas bstan te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bya bas bstan te /
translated: The abiding of the Tathagata is taught by the phrase ‚Äúthe Buddha ground‚Äù.

original: gnas pa mchog de nyid las 'das te /
analyzed: gnas pa mchog de nyid las 'das te /
translated: Having transcended that very supreme abiding,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas shes bya thams cad la chags pa med pa dang / thogs @224b pa med pa'i shes pa dang mthong ba brnyes te /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas shes bya thams cad la chags pa med pa dang / thogs @224b pa med pa'i shes pa dang mthong ba brnyes te /
translated: Having fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood, he attained unobstructed knowledge and vision with regard to all objects of knowledge.

original: sku gsum dang ye shes bzhi dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgya bzhi bcu la sogs pa'i che ba nyid mthar phyin cing sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad pa'i gnas pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: sku gsum dang ye shes bzhi dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgya bzhi bcu la sogs pa'i che ba nyid mthar phyin cing sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad pa'i gnas pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: He perfected the greatness of the three bodies, four kinds of exalted wisdom, one hundred and forty unique qualities of a buddha, and so forth, and abides in the state of performing all the activities of a buddha.

original: sa de dag gi tshig gi don ni ming la mkhas pa'i skabs su 'og nas bstan to //
analyzed: sa de dag gi tshig gi don ni ming la mkhas pa'i skabs su 'og nas bstan to //
translated: The meaning of the words of these levels will be explained below in the section on expertise in names.

original: bshad pa ni rnam pa bdun te /
analyzed: bshad pa ni rnam pa bdun te /
translated: The explanation has seven parts:

original: 'bras bu la mkhas pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang / gnyen po la mkhas pa dang / ming la mkhas pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / gnyen po'i dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / bdag dang gzhan gyi rgyud yongs su smin pa'i gnas pa la mkhas pa dang /
analyzed: 'bras bu la mkhas pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang / gnyen po la mkhas pa dang / ming la mkhas pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / gnyen po'i dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / bdag dang gzhan gyi rgyud yongs su smin pa'i gnas pa la mkhas pa dang /
translated: Skill in the result, skill in the adverse and counteragent, skill in the name, skill in the classification of the adverse, skill in the classification of the counteragent, skill in the state of complete maturation of one's own and others' continuums,

original: bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i thabs la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i thabs la mkhas pa'o //
translated: and skill in the means of fulfilling one's wishes.

original: de la 'bras bu la mkhas pa ni /
analyzed: de la 'bras bu la mkhas pa ni /
translated: Skill in the result is taught from the point in the Sutra where it says,üîΩAvalokite≈õvara, those stages are of four kinds.

original: sa de dag rnam par dag pa du dag dang zhes zhus pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sa de dag ni rnam pa bzhi dang zhes bka' stsal pa'i gnas skabs nas bzung ste /üîΩspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de las dang po ni bsam pa rnam par dag pas bsdus so zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
analyzed: sa de dag rnam par dag pa du dag dang zhes zhus pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sa de dag ni rnam pa bzhi dang zhes bka' stsal pa'i gnas skabs nas bzung ste / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de las dang po ni bsam pa rnam par dag pas bsdus so zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
translated: Skill in the adverse and counteragent is taught from the point in the Sutra where it says,üîΩAvalokite≈õvara, the first is included in the purity of attitude.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po la mkhas pa ni /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po la mkhas pa ni /
translated: Skill in the classification of the adverse is taught from the point in the Sutra where it says,üîΩAvalokite≈õvara, the adverse is fivefold.

original: yan lag du dag gis bsdus lags zhes zhus pa dang / yan lag bcu gcig gis bsdus par rig par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa'i gnas skabs nas bzung ste /
analyzed: yan lag du dag gis bsdus lags zhes zhus pa dang / yan lag bcu gcig gis bsdus par rig par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa'i gnas skabs nas bzung ste /
translated: The eleven members are indicated in the passage beginning with the question, By how many members is it embraced? and ending with the statement, It should be understood as embraced by eleven members.

original: yan lag bcu gcig gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //üîΩming la mkhas pa ni /
analyzed: yan lag bcu gcig gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to // ming la mkhas pa ni /
translated: The eleven members are indicated in the passage beginning with the question, What are the eleven members? and ending with the statement, It should be understood as embraced by eleven members.

original: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du sa dang po la rab tu dga' zhes bgyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //üîΩmi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa ni /üîΩbcom ldan 'das sa de dag la kun du rmongs pa ni du mchis gnas ngan len mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni du mchis lags zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du sa dang po la rab tu dga' zhes bgyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to // mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa ni / bcom ldan 'das sa de dag la kun du rmongs pa ni du mchis gnas ngan len mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni du mchis lags zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
translated: Skill in names is indicated in the passage beginning with the question, Blessed One, why is the first stage called the Joyous? and ending with the statement, It should be understood as skill in names.üîΩ Skill in the classification of counteragents is indicated in the passage beginning with the question, Blessed One, how many kinds of error are there on these stages? and ending with the statement, It should be understood as skill in the classification of counteragents.üîΩ Skill in the classification of counteragents is indicated in the passage beginning with the question, Blessed One, how many kinds of purification are established in these stages? and ending with the statement, It should be understood as skill in the classification of counteragents.

original: gnyen po'i rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa ni bcom ldan 'das de dag rnam par dag pa du dag gis rnam par gzhag lags zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
analyzed: gnyen po'i rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa ni bcom ldan 'das de dag rnam par dag pa du dag gis rnam par gzhag lags zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
translated: Skill in the classification of counteragents is indicated in the passage beginning with the question, Blessed One, how many kinds of purification are established in these stages? and ending with the statement, It should be understood as skill in the classification of counteragents.

original: bdag dang gzhan gyi rgyud yongs su smin pa'i gnas la mkhas pa ni /üîΩbcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du srid par skye ba thams cad kyi nang na /
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi rgyud yongs su smin pa'i gnas la mkhas pa ni / bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du srid par skye ba thams cad kyi nang na /
translated: Skill in the basis of complete maturation of one's own and others' mindstreamsüîΩis indicated by the question,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba rab mchog ces bgyi lags zhes bya ba la sogs pas @225a * //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba rab mchog ces bgyi lags zhes bya ba la sogs pas @225a * //
translated: Bhagavan, why is the birth of a bodhisattva in all births in existence said to be the best?üîΩSkill in the means of fulfilling one's wishes

original: bstan to // bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i thabs la mkhas pa ni /
analyzed: bstan to // bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i thabs la mkhas pa ni /
translated: is indicated by the question,

original: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam rgya chen pos mchi ba dang / smon lam gya nom pa dang ldan pa dang smon lam gyi stobs can lags zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam rgya chen pos mchi ba dang / smon lam gya nom pa dang ldan pa dang smon lam gyi stobs can lags zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
translated: Bhagavan, why are bodhisattvas said to be those who go by means of vast aspirations, those who possess excellent aspirations, and those who have the power of aspiration?

original: de la dang por 'bras bu la mkhas pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de la dang por 'bras bu la mkhas pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: Among those, first I will explain the meaning of the words of skill in fruition and so on.

original: 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni sa thams cad ni rgyu'i lus dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid kyis rab tu phye ba 'jug pa dang gnas pa'i ngo bo nyid yin te /

original: byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa bcu dang / de bzhin gshegs ba'i gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang snga ma snga ma ni rgyu'i lus yin la /

original: phyi ma phyi ma ni 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid yin pas /
analyzed: phyi ma phyi ma ni 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid yin pas /
translated: The former is the body of the cause and the latter is the nature of the result.

original: rgyu'i lus ni 'jug pa'i ngo bo nyid yin 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid ni gnas pa'i ngo bo nyid yin mod kyi /
analyzed: rgyu'i lus ni 'jug pa'i ngo bo nyid yin 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid ni gnas pa'i ngo bo nyid yin mod kyi /

original: rigs la gnas pa dang mos pas spyod pa la gnas pa 'jig rten pa de gnyis la brten nas rab tu dga' ba la gnas pa yan chad ni thams cad kyang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gnas pa mngon par rtogs pa yin pas 'bras bu zhes bya'o //

translated: However, the stages of the one abiding in the lineage and the one abiding in the practice of devoted interest are both mundane. In dependence on those two, the stage of the joyous and so on are all supramundane stages that are realizations and thus are called results.

original: 'bras bu la mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu de dag kyang rnam par dag pa bzhis bsdus pas sa rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu la mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu de dag kyang rnam par dag pa bzhis bsdus pas sa rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa gang yin pa ste /

analyzed: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /

original: de las sa dang po ni bsam pa rnam par dag pas bsdus so zhes bya ba ni sa dang po ni lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas yin la /
analyzed: de las sa dang po ni bsam pa rnam par dag pas bsdus so zhes bya ba ni sa dang po ni lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas yin la /

analyzed: bsam pa rnam par dag pa yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa'i khams sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la yod pa nyid du yid ches pas rab tu phye ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khams sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la yon tan dang ldan pa nyid du yid ches pas rab tu phye ba'i rgyu las byung ba / bsam pa mngon par rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid bsams pa las byung ba'i shes rab chen po'i ngo bo nyid dang de dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir sa dang po ni bsam pa rnam par dag pas
translated: The pure attitude is the cause of the bodhisattvas' attitude, which is classified as confidence in the existence of the qualities of the Buddha and the cause of the bodhisattvas' superior attitude, which is classified as confidence in the possession of the qualities of the Buddha.

original: bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: bsdus pa yin no //
translated: The first level is subsumed by the pure attitude because it is the nature of the realization of the attitude, the nature of the great wisdom that arises from reflection and the nature of the factors that contribute to enlightenment and the qualities associated with it.

analyzed: bsam pa mngon par rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid de yang byang chub @225b sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mos pa dang / so sor rtog pa dang nges par 'byed pa dad pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa sngon du 'gro ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: The nature of the realization of the will is the bodhisattva's superior will, which is faith in the Buddha natures, discernment, and the will to find out, preceded by faith and preceded by discernment of the teaching.

original: brtan pa'i bsam pa dang / mi slu ba'i bsam pa dang / ma dag pa'i bsam pa dang / dag pa'i bsam pa dang / shin tu dag pa'i bsam pa dang / tshar gcad pa'i bsam pa dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i bsam pa'o //
analyzed: brtan pa'i bsam pa dang / mi slu ba'i bsam pa dang / ma dag pa'i bsam pa dang / dag pa'i bsam pa dang / shin tu dag pa'i bsam pa dang / tshar gcad pa'i bsam pa dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i bsam pa'o //
translated: the resolve of stability, the resolve of non-deception, the impure resolve, the pure resolve, the very pure resolve, the resolve of annihilation, and the innate resolve.

original: de la mchog gi bsam pa zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog rnam la byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa gang yin pa'o //

original: pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsam pa zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab yang dag par 'grub par bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa gang yin pa'o //

original: don gang la lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / khyad par gang gis lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / sa gang la lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / go rims gang gis lhag pa'i bsam par gyur pa'o //

original: ma dag pa'i bsam pa dang / dag pa'i bsam pa dang / shin tu dag pa'i bsam pa dang / go rims bzhin no //
analyzed: ma dag pa'i bsam pa dang / dag pa'i bsam pa dang / shin tu dag pa'i bsam pa dang / go rims bzhin no //
translated: They are the impure attitude, the pure attitude, and the extremely pure attitude, respectively.

original: go rims gang gis she na /
analyzed: go rims gang gis she na /
translated: By what order?

original: rnam pa gsum gyis te /
analyzed: rnam pa gsum gyis te /

analyzed: ma dag pa'i bsam pas dag pa'i bsam pa bskyed la dag pa'i bsam pas shin tu dag pa'i bsam pa bskyed pa ste /
translated: With an impure intention one generates a pure intention, and with a pure intention one generates a very pure intention.

analyzed: tshar gcad pa'i bsam pa dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i bsam pa dang go rims bzhin no //

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lhag pa'i bsam pa dge bas thams cad du rtogs pa bco lnga po de dag gis bya ba bcu byed de /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lhag pa'i bsam pa dge bas thams cad du rtogs pa bco lnga po de dag gis bya ba bcu byed de /

original: mchog gi bsam pas ni dkon mchog la mchod pa dang / byang chub kyi tshogs thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i rnam pa thams cad la sbyor bar byed de /
