translated: With the highest intention, they apply themselves to the highest worship of the Three Jewels and to all the requisites of enlightenment.

original: tshul khrims kyi bsam pas ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims so //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi bsam pas ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims so //
translated: With the intention of morality, they practice the morality of the bodhisattvas.

original: sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa la srog gi phyir yang bsams bzhin du nyes par 'byung bar mi byed la /
analyzed: sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa la srog gi phyir yang bsams bzhin du nyes par 'byung bar mi byed la /
translated: They do not, even for the sake of their life, intentionally violate the vows of the bodhisattva discipline that they have taken.

original: nyes pa byung na yang myur ba myur bar so sor 'chags par byed do //
analyzed: nyes pa byung na yang myur ba myur bar so sor 'chags par byed do //
translated: And if they do violate them, they quickly confess them.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsam pas ni //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsam pas ni //
translated: By the intention of the perfections,

original: dge ba'i chos rnams bsgom pa rtag tu byed pas bag yod par gnas shing mchog tu bag yod par gnas par byed pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i chos rnams bsgom pa rtag tu byed pas bag yod par gnas shing mchog tu bag yod par gnas par byed pa'o //
translated: he always practices the cultivation of the wholesome dharmas, and so he abides in heedfulness and in the highest heedfulness.

original: de kho na'i don gyi bsam pas ni sems can gyi phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i sems kyis 'khor bar 'khor bar byed la mya ngan las 'das pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mi gtong bar yang byed do //
analyzed: de kho na'i don gyi bsam pas ni sems can gyi phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i sems kyis 'khor bar 'khor bar byed la mya ngan las 'das pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mi gtong bar yang byed do //
translated: By the intention of the meaning of reality, he turns the wheel of life for the sake of beings, with a mind that is not defiled, and he does not abandon the superior intention for nirvana.

original: mthu'i bsam pas ni bstan pa la snying thag pa nas dad cing ston par yang byed la bsgom pa la gces par 'dzin te /
analyzed: mthu'i bsam pas ni bstan pa la snying thag pa nas dad cing ston par yang byed la bsgom pa la gces par 'dzin te /
translated: By the intention of power, he has faith in the teaching from the bottom of his heart, and he teaches, and he values cultivation.

original: 'dod pa skyes pas shas cher gnas la thos pa dang bsam pa tsam gyis chog par mi 'dzin par byed do //
analyzed: 'dod pa skyes pas shas cher gnas la thos pa dang bsam pa tsam gyis chog par mi 'dzin par byed do //
translated: He does not consider listening and reflection to be sufficient, and he abides mostly in the generation of desire.

original: phan pa'i bsam pa dang / bde ba'i bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas ni sems can gyi don gyi bya ba rnam pa thams cad la sbyor bar byed de //
analyzed: phan pa'i bsam pa dang / bde ba'i bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas ni sems can gyi don gyi bya ba rnam pa thams cad la sbyor bar byed de //
translated: By the intention of benefit, the intention of happiness, and the superior intention, he engages in all the activities for the sake of beings.

original: sbyor ba byas kyang yongs su skyob mi skyed par byed do //
analyzed: sbyor ba byas kyang yongs su skyob mi skyed par byed do //
translated: Even when he is engaged in the practice, he does not become completely exhausted.

original: brtan pa'i bsam pas ni brtson 'grus 'bar ba dang / brtson 'grus rgya chen po yang dag par rtsom pa la gnas te //üîΩsbyor @227a * //
analyzed: brtan pa'i bsam pas ni brtson 'grus 'bar ba dang / brtson 'grus rgya chen po yang dag par rtsom pa la gnas te // sbyor @227a * //
translated: With a firm intention, he abides in the blazing of effort and the undertaking of great effort.

original: ba lhod par mi 'gyur zhing sbyor ba nyams par mi 'gyur bar byed do //
analyzed: ba lhod par mi 'gyur zhing sbyor ba nyams par mi 'gyur bar byed do //
translated: He does not become lax in his practice, nor does he allow his practice to deteriorate.

original: mi slu ba'i bsam pas ni dge ba'i chos mngon par bsgrub pa de dang de dag la mngon par shes pa myur bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: mi slu ba'i bsam pas ni dge ba'i chos mngon par bsgrub pa de dang de dag la mngon par shes pa myur bar 'gyur te /
translated: With an undeceptive intention, he quickly gains the higher knowledge of those virtuous qualities that are to be accomplished.

original: khyad par thob pa dma' ba dang / cung zad tsam dang ngan don tsam gyis chog par mi 'dzin par byed do //
analyzed: khyad par thob pa dma' ba dang / cung zad tsam dang ngan don tsam gyis chog par mi 'dzin par byed do //
translated: He does not become satisfied with a small amount of attainment, a small amount of progress, or a small amount of benefit.

original: tshar gcad pa'i bsam pas ni lhan cig skyes pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa 'dren par byed do //
analyzed: tshar gcad pa'i bsam pas ni lhan cig skyes pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa 'dren par byed do //
translated: With a decisive intention, he arouses the superior intention that is innate.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i bsam pas ni lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byed do //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i bsam pas ni lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byed do //
translated: With the coemergent attitude, they quickly attain manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment in order to benefit and bring happiness to gods and humans.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs de dang de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa bstan pa dang / gdags pa dang bshad pa thams cad kyang bsam pa bco lnga po 'dir 'dus la dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang bsam pa bco lnga po 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas naüîΩbsam pa bco lnga po 'di dag ni byang chub chen po'i 'bras bu'i phan yon can yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs de dang de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa bstan pa dang / gdags pa dang bshad pa thams cad kyang bsam pa bco lnga po 'dir 'dus la dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang bsam pa bco lnga po 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas na bsam pa bco lnga po 'di dag ni byang chub chen po'i 'bras bu'i phan yon can yin pa'i phyir /
translated: In all those contexts, the Blessed One revealed the bodhisattvas‚Äô superior attitude, and all the designations and explanations are included within these fifteen attitudes. All the bodhisattvas of the three times attain manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment through these fifteen attitudes.

original: 'bras bu la mkhas pa'i skabs su bstan to //
analyzed: 'bras bu la mkhas pa'i skabs su bstan to //
translated: Therefore, these fifteen attitudes are taught in the context of expertise with regard to the result because they are the benefits of the result of great enlightenment.

original: sa dang po'i skabs 'dir ma dag pa'i bsam pa ni dag par gyur la /
analyzed: sa dang po'i skabs 'dir ma dag pa'i bsam pa ni dag par gyur la /
translated: At this stage of the first level, impure intention becomes pure.

original: shin tu dag pa'i bsam pa ni rgyu'i lus su yod pas /
analyzed: shin tu dag pa'i bsam pa ni rgyu'i lus su yod pas /
translated: And since extremely pure intention is present in the causal body,

original: bsam pa rnam par dag pa bco lnga po thams cad kyis bsdus par blta bar bya'o //üîΩsa gnyis pa ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pas so zhes bya ba ni sa gnyis pa ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa yin la /
analyzed: bsam pa rnam par dag pa bco lnga po thams cad kyis bsdus par blta bar bya'o // sa gnyis pa ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pas so zhes bya ba ni sa gnyis pa ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa yin la /
translated: it should be regarded as being included in all fifteen kinds of pure intention.üîΩOn the second level, it is said that the bodhisattvas' superior discipline is pure.

original: lhag pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyi dge ba mi lcogs pa med pa la sogs pa'i gnas thams cad la brten te dmigs pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i tshul khrims mngon par rtogs pa 'phags pa dgyes pa'i lus dang
analyzed: lhag pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyi dge ba mi lcogs pa med pa la sogs pa'i gnas thams cad la brten te dmigs pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i tshul khrims mngon par rtogs pa 'phags pa dgyes pa'i lus dang
translated: On the second level, bodhisattvas abide in superior discipline and their superior discipline is pure because, on the basis of all the levels such as the stage of direct realization of the wholesome state of mind of the bodhisattvas, they have realized discipline that comes from the cause of taking the bodhisattva vow and is the basis for the bodhisattva's discipline.

original: / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi ngo bo nyid dang de dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi ngo bo nyid dang de dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because it is the nature of the verbal and mental actions and of the factors that contribute to enlightenment that are associated with it.

original: sa gnyis pa ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pas bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: sa gnyis pa ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pas bsdus pa yin no //
translated: The second stage is included in the purity of superior morality.

original: tshul khrims mngon par rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i tshul khrims bslab pa rnam par dag pa shes nas dad pa @227b thob pas rab tu phye ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims mngon par rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i tshul khrims bslab pa rnam par dag pa shes nas dad pa @227b thob pas rab tu phye ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: The essence of the realization of morality is the purity of the bodhisattva‚Äôs training in superior morality.

original: de ni rnam pa dgu ste //
analyzed: de ni rnam pa dgu ste //
translated: It is ninefold:

original: tshul khrims kyi ngo bo nyid dang / tshul khrims thams cad dang / dka' ba'i tshul khrims dang / thams cad kyi sgo nas tshul khrims dang / skyes bu dam pa'i tshul khrims dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / phongs shing 'dod pa la tshul khrims dang /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi ngo bo nyid dang / tshul khrims thams cad dang / dka' ba'i tshul khrims dang / thams cad kyi sgo nas tshul khrims dang / skyes bu dam pa'i tshul khrims dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / phongs shing 'dod pa la tshul khrims dang /
translated: the essence of morality, morality in its totality, morality that is difficult to carry out, morality that is directed everywhere, morality of the holy spiritual offspring, morality in all its forms, morality in the face of want and desire, morality in the face of fear, and morality in the face of distraction.

original: 'di dang gzhan du bde bar 'gyur ba'i tshul khrims dang / rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims so //
analyzed: 'di dang gzhan du bde bar 'gyur ba'i tshul khrims dang / rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims so //
translated: Morality is the cause of happiness in this life and the next, and pure morality.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po chen po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'bras bu skyed pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po chen po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'bras bu skyed pa ste /
translated: This great aggregate of morality of the bodhisattva produces the fruit of the bodhisattva.

original: 'di la brten nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na 'bras bu la mkhas pa'i skabs su bstan to //
analyzed: 'di la brten nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na 'bras bu la mkhas pa'i skabs su bstan to //
translated: Based on it, the bodhisattva perfects the transcendence of morality and fully awakens to unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment. Thus, it is taught in the chapter on skill in means.

original: sa gsum pa ni lhag pa'i sems rnam par dag pas so zhes bya ba ni sa gsum pa ni lhag pa'i sems la gnas pa yin la /
analyzed: sa gsum pa ni lhag pa'i sems rnam par dag pas so zhes bya ba ni sa gsum pa ni lhag pa'i sems la gnas pa yin la /
translated: The third stage is the pure superior mind.

original: lhag pa'i sems rnam par dag pa ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bas rab tu phye ba bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa nyer bsdogs dang / dngos gzhir bcas pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir sa gsum po ni lhag pa'i sems rnam par dag pas bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: lhag pa'i sems rnam par dag pa ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bas rab tu phye ba bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa nyer bsdogs dang / dngos gzhir bcas pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir sa gsum po ni lhag pa'i sems rnam par dag pas bsdus pa yin no //
translated: The purity of superior mind is included in the third stage, because it is the nature of the meditative stabilization and meditative absorption of the access and actual concentrations that are distinguished by freedom from attachment to the desire realm.

original: bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa nyer bsdogs dang dngos gzhir bcas pa'i ngo bo nyid de yang byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa rnam par dag pa bsam gtan thob pas rab tu phye ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa nyer bsdogs dang dngos gzhir bcas pa'i ngo bo nyid de yang byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa rnam par dag pa bsam gtan thob pas rab tu phye ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: That nature of the meditative stabilization and meditative absorption of the access and actual concentrations is the purity of the bodhisattva's training in superior mind, which is distinguished by the attainment of the concentrations.

original: de yang rnam pa dgu ste /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa dgu ste /
translated: That is also ninefold.

original: bsam gtan gyi ngo bo nyid dang / dngos gzhir bcas pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gtan gyi ngo bo nyid dang / dka' ba'i bsam gtan dang / thams cad kyi sgo nas bsam gtan dang / skyes bu dam pa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi bsam gtan dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi ngo bo nyid dang / dngos gzhir bcas pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gtan gyi ngo bo nyid dang / dka' ba'i bsam gtan dang / thams cad kyi sgo nas bsam gtan dang / skyes bu dam pa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi bsam gtan dang /
translated: the essence of meditative concentration, the essence of meditative concentration with its actual basis, meditative concentration that is difficult to master, meditative concentration in all its forms, the meditative concentration of holy beings, meditative concentration in all its aspects,

original: phongs shing 'dod pa la bsam gtan dang / 'di dang gzhan du bde bar 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par dag pa'i bsam gtan no //
analyzed: phongs shing 'dod pa la bsam gtan dang / 'di dang gzhan du bde bar 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par dag pa'i bsam gtan no //
translated: meditative concentration on what is lacking and desired, meditative concentration that brings happiness here and in the next world and pure meditative concentration.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan dpag tu med pa 'di dag ni byang chub chen po'i 'bras bur gyur pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan dpag tu med pa 'di dag ni byang chub chen po'i 'bras bur gyur pa ste /
translated: These are the bodhisattvas' immeasurable concentrations, which have the result of great enlightenment.

original: de dag la brten nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa @228a * //
analyzed: de dag la brten nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa @228a * //
translated: On the basis of these, the bodhisattvas attain the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration.

original: yongs su rdzogs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na 'bras bu la mkhas pa'i skabs su bstan to //
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na 'bras bu la mkhas pa'i skabs su bstan to //
translated: The stage of the result is taught.

original: sa bzhi pa nas bzung ste /
analyzed: sa bzhi pa nas bzung ste /
translated: From the fourth stageüîΩup to the Buddha stage, it should be understood that they are included in the ever more refined, ever more sublime, ever more excellent, ever more special, ever more sublime, and ever more ultimate purification of superior wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar ni lhag pa'i shes rab rnam par dag pa gong nas gong du gya nom pa bas kyang ches gya nom pas bsdus par rig par bya ste zhes bya ba ni sa bzhi pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i shes rabüîΩla gnas pa yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar ni lhag pa'i shes rab rnam par dag pa gong nas gong du gya nom pa bas kyang ches gya nom pas bsdus par rig par bya ste zhes bya ba ni sa bzhi pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i shes rab la gnas pa yin /
translated: The fourth stage is the stage of the superior wisdom endowed with the factors of awakening.

original: sa lnga pa ni bden pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i shes rab la gnas pa yin /
analyzed: sa lnga pa ni bden pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i shes rab la gnas pa yin /
translated: The fifth stage is the stage of the superior wisdom endowed with the truths.

original: sa drug pa ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i shes rab la gnas pa yin /
analyzed: sa drug pa ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i shes rab la gnas pa yin /
translated: The sixth stage is the stage of the superior wisdom endowed with dependent origination.

original: sa bdun pa ni gnas pa snga ma de gsum gyi dbang du byas nas mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas shing rtsol ba dang bcas pa yin pas de yang lhag pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu phye ba yin //üîΩsa brgyad pa ni mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa snga ma de nyid shas cher bsgoms pas mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa mngon par 'du byed pa med cing lhun gyis grub pa yin pas de yang lhag pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu phye ba yin
analyzed: sa bdun pa ni gnas pa snga ma de gsum gyi dbang du byas nas mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas shing rtsol ba dang bcas pa yin pas de yang lhag pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu phye ba yin // sa brgyad pa ni mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa snga ma de nyid shas cher bsgoms pas mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa mngon par 'du byed pa med cing lhun gyis grub pa yin pas de yang lhag pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu phye ba yin
translated: The seventh level is that of abiding in the absence of attributes, but with some deliberate effort and some degree of conditioning, based on the three foregoing levels of abiding.üîΩThe eighth level is that of abiding in the absence of attributes, but without any deliberate effort or conditioning, since one has cultivated that to a very great degree.

original: / sa dgu pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu yongs su dag cing mi g-yo ba de nyid la brten nas so so yang dag par rig pa la gnas pa yin pas de yang lhag pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu phye ba yin /
analyzed: / sa dgu pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu yongs su dag cing mi g-yo ba de nyid la brten nas so so yang dag par rig pa la gnas pa yin pas de yang lhag pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu phye ba yin /
translated: The ninth level is that of abiding in one's thorough understanding of what needs to be known, based on that very same state of meditative absorption endowed with the wisdom of the ninth level, which is extremely pure and unwavering.

original: sa bcu pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu chos kyi dbang bskur ba chen po thob pas gnas pa mchog yin pa'i phyir de yang lhag pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu phye ba yin /üîΩsangs rgyas kyis ni 'bras bu'i gnas te spangs pa dang ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin pas de yang lhag pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu phye ba yin la lhag pa'i shes rab rnam par dag pa ni shes bya ji lta ba bzhin du yod pa nyid
analyzed: sa bcu pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu chos kyi dbang bskur ba chen po thob pas gnas pa mchog yin pa'i phyir de yang lhag pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu phye ba yin / sangs rgyas kyis ni 'bras bu'i gnas te spangs pa dang ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin pas de yang lhag pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu phye ba yin la lhag pa'i shes rab rnam par dag pa ni shes bya ji lta ba bzhin du yod pa nyid
translated: The tenth level is the supreme state because it is the great consecration of the gnosis of Dharma in unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment and it is distinguished by superior wisdom.üîΩThe level of buddhahood is the resultant state, perfect elimination and gnosis and it is distinguished by superior wisdom.üîΩAnd the purity of superior wisdom is the essence of the wisdom that realizes the mode of being of knowable phenomena just as it is and the gnosis that realizes the extent of knowable phenomena.

original: kyis rtogs pa'i shes rab dang shes bya ji snyed yod pa nyid kyis rtogs pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo yin pas na sa bzhi pa yan chad ni shes rab rnam par dag pas bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: kyis rtogs pa'i shes rab dang shes bya ji snyed yod pa nyid kyis rtogs pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo yin pas na sa bzhi pa yan chad ni shes rab rnam par dag pas bsdus pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, from the fourth level up, the levels are subsumed in the purity of wisdom.

original: shes rab dang ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid de yang slob pa dang mi slob pa'i rgyu de la mnga' ba don dam pa'i bden pa dang / kun rdzob kyi bden pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'byed pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab dang ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid de yang slob pa dang mi slob pa'i rgyu de la mnga' ba don dam pa'i bden pa dang / kun rdzob kyi bden pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'byed pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The essence of wisdom and intuition is also the mastery of the cause of learning and non-learning, which is ultimate reality, and the discrimination of the conventional reality just as it is.

original: de yang rnam pa dgu ste /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa dgu ste /
translated: That is also ninefold:

original: shes rab kyi ngo bo nyid dang / shes @228b rab thams cad dang / thams cad kyi sgo nas shes rab dang / skyes bu dam pa'i shes rab dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang / phongs pa'i 'dod pa la shes rab dang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi ngo bo nyid dang / shes @228b rab thams cad dang / thams cad kyi sgo nas shes rab dang / skyes bu dam pa'i shes rab dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang / phongs pa'i 'dod pa la shes rab dang /
translated: the essence of wisdom, all wisdom, wisdom in all ways, the wisdom of holy beings, wisdom in all aspects, wisdom in the desire for the destitute,

original: 'di dang gzhan du bde bar 'gyur ba'i shes rab dang / rnam par dag pa'i shes rab bo //
analyzed: 'di dang gzhan du bde bar 'gyur ba'i shes rab dang / rnam par dag pa'i shes rab bo //
translated: wisdom in the happiness of this life and the next, and pure wisdom.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab shin tu rnam par nges shing dpag tu med pa 'di ni byang chub chen po'i 'bras bur 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab shin tu rnam par nges shing dpag tu med pa 'di ni byang chub chen po'i 'bras bur 'gyur ba ste /
translated: The wisdom of the bodhisattvas, very certain and immeasurable, is the result of great enlightenment.

original: de la brten nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs te /
analyzed: de la brten nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs te /
translated: On the basis of that, the bodhisattvas complete the perfection of wisdom

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na /
translated: and fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete enlightenment.

original: 'bras bu la mkhas pa'i skabs su bstan to //
analyzed: 'bras bu la mkhas pa'i skabs su bstan to //
translated: Therefore, it is taught in the section on skill in results.

original: sa de dag ni rnam par dag pa bzhi po dag gis bsdus pa yin no zhes bya ba ni mjug bsdu ba yin te //
analyzed: sa de dag ni rnam par dag pa bzhi po dag gis bsdus pa yin no zhes bya ba ni mjug bsdu ba yin te //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthose levels are included in four purities‚Äù is the summary.

original: sa de dag ni zhes bya bas ni 'bras bu bstan to //
analyzed: sa de dag ni zhes bya bas ni 'bras bu bstan to //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthose levels‚Äù teaches the result.

original: rnam par dag pa bzhi po de dag gis bsdus pa yin no zhes bya bas ni 'bras bu la mkhas pa bstan te /
analyzed: rnam par dag pa bzhi po de dag gis bsdus pa yin no zhes bya bas ni 'bras bu la mkhas pa bstan te /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúare included in four purities‚Äù teaches skill in results.

original: de yang mdor bsdu na 'jig rten pa'i sa las yang dag par 'das pa ma mthong ba'i lam gyis rab tu phye ba lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pas ni sa dang po'i 'bras bu thams cad bsdus pa yin la mthong ba'i lam de nyid shes nasüîΩdad pa'i tshul khrims thob pa la brten te /üîΩbsgom pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pas ni sa gnyis pa'i 'bras bu thams cad bsdus so //
analyzed: de yang mdor bsdu na 'jig rten pa'i sa las yang dag par 'das pa ma mthong ba'i lam gyis rab tu phye ba lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pas ni sa dang po'i 'bras bu thams cad bsdus pa yin la mthong ba'i lam de nyid shes nas dad pa'i tshul khrims thob pa la brten te / bsgom pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pas ni sa gnyis pa'i 'bras bu thams cad bsdus so //
translated: In brief, the result of the first level is subsumed by pure superior intention, which is classified as the path of seeing that completely transcends the mundane level.üîΩThe result of the second level is subsumed by pure discipline, which is based on the attainment of the discipline of faith.

original: lhag pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa de la brten te bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa thob pa'o lhag pa'i sems rnam par dag pas ni sa gsum pa'i 'bras bu thams cad bsdus pa yin la /
analyzed: lhag pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa de la brten te bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa thob pa'o lhag pa'i sems rnam par dag pas ni sa gsum pa'i 'bras bu thams cad bsdus pa yin la /
translated: The result of the third level is subsumed by pure superior mind, which is based on pure discipline and the attainment of concentration.

original: lhag pa'i sems rnam par dag pa de dag la brten te shes bya'i dngos po ji snyed yod pa nyid dang ji lta ba bzhin du yod pa nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa dang mthong ba'i lhag pa'i shes rab rnam par dag pas
analyzed: lhag pa'i sems rnam par dag pa de dag la brten te shes bya'i dngos po ji snyed yod pa nyid dang ji lta ba bzhin du yod pa nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa dang mthong ba'i lhag pa'i shes rab rnam par dag pas
translated: On the basis of those pure states of superior concentration, bodhisattvas have the pure, superior wisdom that is the knowledge and seeing of the extent of the things that are to be known and the way they exist, just as they are.üîΩ

original: ni sa bzhi pa yan chad kyi 'bras bu thams cad bsdus par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: ni sa bzhi pa yan chad kyi 'bras bu thams cad bsdus par rig par bya'o //
translated: And on the basis of those pure superior attitudes, the pure superior wisdom that is the knowledge and seeing of the extent of existent knowable phenomena and their nature just as it is comprises all the results of the fourth level and above.

original: de la lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa ni mthong ba'i lam gyi ngo bo nyid yin pas gcig tu yang zad na /
analyzed: de la lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa ni mthong ba'i lam gyi ngo bo nyid yin pas gcig tu yang zad na /
translated: Of these, the pure superior intention is the essence of the path of seeing and so is counted as one.

original: lhag pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang / lhag pa'i sems rnam par dag pa dang / lhag pa'i shes rab rnam par dag pa ni bslab pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na ci'i phyir grangs gsum du nges she na /
analyzed: lhag pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang / lhag pa'i sems rnam par dag pa dang / lhag pa'i shes rab rnam par dag pa ni bslab pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na ci'i phyir grangs gsum du nges she na /
translated: But the pure superior discipline, the pure superior concentration and the pure superior wisdom are all by nature training. Why then are they definitely numbered as three?üîΩThe answer is that they are the basis for concentration,

original: de ni ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas kyi don dang // shes pa'i @229a * //
analyzed: de ni ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas kyi don dang // shes pa'i @229a * //
translated: the basis for knowledge,

original: rten gyi don dang / bya ba byas pa'i don gyi phyir te /
analyzed: rten gyi don dang / bya ba byas pa'i don gyi phyir te /
translated: because of the meaning of basis and the meaning of performing one's duty.

original: de la ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas kyi don ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa yin te /
analyzed: de la ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas kyi don ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa yin te /
translated: Therein, the meaning of basis of samadhi is the training in superior morality,

original: lhag pa'i tshul khrims la gnas na sems rtse gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhag pa'i tshul khrims la gnas na sems rtse gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because if one abides in superior morality, one touches the samadhi of one-pointed mind.

original: shes pa'i rten gyi don ni lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa yin te /
analyzed: shes pa'i rten gyi don ni lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa yin te /
translated: The meaning of basis of knowledge is the training in superior mind,

original: sems mnyam par gzhag pa'i dran pa rtse gcig pa la shes bya'i dngos po la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa dang mthong ba 'jug pa'i shes pa skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems mnyam par gzhag pa'i dran pa rtse gcig pa la shes bya'i dngos po la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa dang mthong ba 'jug pa'i shes pa skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the knowledge that engages the object of knowledge, knowing and seeing things as they are, arises from the one-pointed mindfulness of the mind in equipoise.

original: bya ba byas pa'i don ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa yin te /
analyzed: bya ba byas pa'i don ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa yin te /
translated: The meaning of performing one's duty is the training in superior wisdom,

original: shes pa dang mthong ba 'ba' zhig tu rnam par dag pas nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa spong ba mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa dang mthong ba 'ba' zhig tu rnam par dag pas nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa spong ba mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because one directly realizes the abandonment of afflictive and cognitive obscurations through the purity of mere knowledge and seeing.

original: de ni rang gi don bla na med pa yin pas bya ba byas pa'i don ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: de ni rang gi don bla na med pa yin pas bya ba byas pa'i don ces bya ba ste /
translated: Since that is the unsurpassed benefit for oneself, it is called the object that accomplishes its function.

original: sgrib pa gnyis slong ba de ni bya ba'i mchog yin pas de'i gong du bya ba gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrib pa gnyis slong ba de ni bya ba'i mchog yin pas de'i gong du bya ba gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since the removal of the two obscurations is the supreme function, there is no other function above that.

original: 'o na bslab pa de gsum go rims ci'i phyir de ltar rnam par gzhag ce na /
analyzed: 'o na bslab pa de gsum go rims ci'i phyir de ltar rnam par gzhag ce na /
translated: Why are those three trainings posited in that order?
